resources.string: Invite your friends or family! Bin GO is designed to be for 2 or more players.
Each player should have the Bin GO app on their smartphone or tablet.
Press “Generate card” to randomly generate a new Bin GO card.
Choose one player to call out the number from their device using the “Next number” button.
When the called number is on your card simply tap it to mark it.
